include-citations.description: At end of simulation, display information on how to cite PyLith and components used.

start_python_debugger.description: Start python debugger at beginning of main().

dump_parameters.name: dumpparamters
dump_parameters.description: Dump parameters used and version information to file.

filename.description: Name of file written with parameters.

indent.description: Nmber of spaces to indent, use a negative number for no newlines.

dry.description: prints the command line and exits

nodegen.description: a printf-style format string, used in conjunction with 'nodelist' to generate the list of machine names (e.g., "n%03d")

nodelist.description: a comma-separated list of machine names in square brackets (e.g., [101-103,105,107])

mesh_generator.name: meshimporter
mesh_generator.description: Generates or imports the computational mesh.

partitioner.description: Name of mesh partitioner (PETSc must be built with partitioner).

base.description: Parameter files with metadata that complement this metadata.

label.description: Name of label identifier for fault surface on which to impose impulses.

field.description: Solution subfield associated with boundary condition.

use_initial.description: Use initial term in time-dependent expression.

use_rate.description: Use rate term in time-dependent expression.

use_time_history.description: Use time history term in time-dependent expression.

cell_basis.description: Type of cell basis functions (simplex, tensor, or default). Default is to use type matching cell type.

dimension.description: Topological dimension associated with subfield (=-1 will use dimension of domain).

finite_element_space.description: Finite-element space (polynomial or point). Point space corresponds to delta functions at quadrature points.
